summary.para: Get a four-component vector that contains boolean data.

param.name: pData
param.para: Type: BOOL*
A pointer to the first component.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

summary.para: Get an array of four-component vectors that contain boolean data.

param.name: pData
param.para: Type: BOOL*
A pointer to the start of the data to set.

param.name: Offset
param.para: Type: UINT
Must be set to 0; this is reserved for future use.

param.name: Count
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of array elements to set.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

Must be set to 0; this is reserved for future use.

param.name: Count
param.para: Type: UINT
The number of array elements to set.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.
